subject: Your finance application has been approved! Sign your loan agreement now

header.text: Congratulations {{receiver.contact_name}}! Your finance application has been approved!

rows.text: Great news, the lender has approved your application and all that you need to do now is sign the credit agreement. You can do this by following the instructions in the email from the lender.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.

sms: Great News! You've been approved for finance and all you need to do is sign your credit agreement! Check your emails now! Kanda.
